Professional Evidence Processing Without the Professional Price Tag

Seven industry-standard AI tools working together to give you enterprise-grade eDiscovery capabilities‚Äîcompletely free, completely local, completely yours.

üé•

Body-Worn Camera Processing

Transform BWC footage into court-ready evidence with AI-powered enhancement and analysis.

  • Whisper AI: Transcribe audio with word-level timestamps (MIT license)
  • pyannote.audio: Identify and separate speakers (officer vs civilian)
  • Real-ESRGAN: Enhance video quality with AI super-resolution (4x upscaling)
  • YOLOv8: Detect objects, people, weapons, vehicles in footage
  • FFmpeg: Stabilize shaky footage, normalize audio, extract frames
Cost Savings: Whisper is free vs $0.36/hour for cloud transcription. 100 hours BWC = $36 saved.
üìÑ

Document Intelligence

Extract, analyze, and search across police reports, discovery documents, and legal filings.

  • Tesseract OCR: Extract text from scanned PDFs and images (Apache 2.0)
  • spaCy NLP: Identify names, dates, locations, case numbers automatically
  • sentence-transformers: Semantic search finds relevant documents by meaning
  • Chain of Custody: SHA-256 checksums verify document integrity
  • Metadata Extraction: Capture creation dates, authors, edit history
Cost Savings: Tesseract is free vs $1.50 per 1,000 pages for cloud OCR. 10,000 pages = $15 saved.
üì°

CAD/RMS Data Analysis

Parse computer-aided dispatch logs and records management system exports for patterns.

  • Timeline Construction: Build chronological timelines from CAD timestamps
  • Entity Extraction: Link officer names, unit numbers, locations across records
  • Pattern Detection: Identify discrepancies between CAD, BWC, and reports
  • Format Support: CSV, JSON, XML, PDF exports from any CAD system
  • Cross-Reference: Match incident IDs across evidence sources
Automation: spaCy extracts entities 100x faster than manual review.
üîí

Secure Evidence Vault

Court-defensible storage with cryptographic verification and audit trails.

  • SHA-256 Checksums: Verify files haven't been tampered with
  • Audit Logs: Track every access, export, and modification
  • Original Preservation: Non-destructive processing keeps originals intact
  • Export Packages: Bundle evidence with chain of custody documentation
  • Encryption: AES-256 encryption for sensitive materials (optional)
Court-Ready: Meet Federal Rules of Evidence 901(b)(9) for digital authentication.
üé®

Forensic Media Enhancement

Improve quality of photos and videos for court presentation without altering originals.

  • Image Super-Resolution: Enhance low-quality surveillance footage (Real-ESRGAN)
  • Audio Forensics: Noise reduction, volume normalization, speech isolation
  • Video Stabilization: Fix shaky handheld camera footage
  • Frame Extraction: Pull still images from video at key moments
  • Comparison Views: Side-by-side before/after for court exhibits
Processing Speed: GPU acceleration processes 4K video at 30+ fps.
‚öñÔ∏è

Supreme Law Research

Access Supreme Court opinions, generate Bluebook citations, build legal arguments.

  • CourtListener API: Search 330+ years of SCOTUS decisions
  • Citation Generator: Automatic Bluebook-compliant citations
  • Semantic Search: Find relevant precedents by legal concept, not just keywords
  • Case Summaries: AI-generated summaries of holdings and reasoning
  • Export Formats: Markdown, PDF, Word-compatible case briefs
Cost Savings: Free vs $40/month for Westlaw, $35/month for LexisNexis.

From Evidence to Analysis in Four Steps

Our streamlined workflow takes you from raw evidence files to court-ready exhibits with minimal manual intervention.

1

Upload Evidence

Drag and drop BWC videos, police reports, CAD logs, photos, or any discovery documents. SHA-256 checksums are generated immediately to preserve chain of custody. Supports MP4, MOV, PDF, JPG, PNG, CSV, JSON, DOCX, and more.

2

AI Processing

Our local AI tools run automatically: Whisper transcribes audio, pyannote identifies speakers, Tesseract extracts text from documents, spaCy finds names and dates, YOLOv8 detects objects. All processing happens on your machine‚Äînothing sent to cloud servers.

3

Search & Analyze

Use semantic search to find relevant passages across thousands of pages. Query by natural language ("when did Officer Smith arrive?") instead of exact keywords. Build timelines, cross-reference evidence, identify contradictions automatically.

4

Export Court-Ready Exhibits

Generate professional evidence packages with transcripts, enhanced media, annotated timelines, and chain of custody documentation. Export to PDF, Word, or structured JSON. All exports include verification checksums.

Our Foundation

Built on Principle

Every great cut starts with a steady hand, sharp tools, and clear vision.
Accountability is no different ‚Äî precision matters, and the details define the outcome.

01

Record

Truth is preserved through accurate, contemporaneous documentation. The blade doesn't lie ‚Äî neither does the timestamp.

02

Accountability

Power must answer to evidence, not narrative. A clean line requires a clean process.

03

Documentation exists to prevent harm, not escalate it. The goal is resolution, not retribution.

04

05

Open processes build public trust. Every action is visible, every decision is documented, every method is disclosed.

06

Data belongs to those who create it. No harvesting, no selling, no surveillance ‚Äî your footage stays yours.
